description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. One of the most popular games of all time, now for your Xbox 360! Includes 30 word categories, 3 difficulty levels, high scores and many backgrounds to customize the game.
